titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-ethylhexyl (4-chloro-2-methylphenoxy) acetate.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-ethylhexyl (4-chloro-2-methylphenoxy) acetate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-ethylhexyl (4-chloro-2-methylphenoxy) acetate.
